name: POLAR (itch)
description:
Overview

Welcome to a barren world, destroyed by robots, where you have to escape an abandoned building and fly away to another planet. POLAR is a very challenging skill platformer where you have to use your gun to interact with everything and cope with your inability to move in air.

Features

-7 distinct areas!

-6 different characters!

-3 endings!

-8 achievements to get!

-Speedrun Mode and Hard Mode for veterans!

-Unique, minimalistic pixel-art style!

-A beautiful soundtrack in just intonation by misotanni!

Controls Bonus Content

You can buy the soundtrack separately on bandcamp:

https://misotanni.bandcamp.com/album/polar-ost

Or here on itch.io, together with some art as well as the sounds and sprites from the game:
